definition: to rest/to go to sleep/to rest in peace/(history) Parthia
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
Styrax officinalis or Styrax benzoin/benzoin resin (used in TCM)/Benzoinum
Styracaceae, tree family including silver-bell, snowdrop and benzoin

sentences.english: Rest in peace Steve and thanks for everything.
sentences.chinese: 感謝喬布斯所做的一切，願他安息。

sentences.english: There we can rest at peace forever!
sentences.chinese: 在那裏我們將永遠安息在平安裏。

sentences.english: Therefore the LORD your God has commanded you to observe the Sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，耶和華你的神吩咐你守安息日。

sentences.english: We go to Shabbat dinner every Friday.
sentences.chinese: 每個星期五，我們都去參加安息日晚宴。

sentences.english: Christian should not break the Sabbath.
A new species of Styracaceae from China.
sentences.chinese: 中國安息香科的一個新種。

sentences.english: Remember that thou keep holy the sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 應記住安息日，守爲聖日。

sentences.english: With shame and grief he dared no longer look towards that heaven where his father lived.
sentences.chinese: 愧疚悲傷令他不敢望向父親安息的天堂。

sentences.english: Therefore it is lawful to do good on the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 所以在安息日作善事是可以的。

sentences.english: He lies at rest in the Martyrs' Cemetery.
21They went to Capernaum, and when the Sabbath came, Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach.
sentences.chinese: 到了迦百家，耶穌就在安息日進了會堂教訓人。

sentences.english: 54It was Preparation Day, and the Sabbath was about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 那日是預備日，安息日也快到了。

sentences.english: Christ restored the Sabbath to its original beauty and luster.
sentences.chinese: 基督使安息日恢復它本來的美意和光澤。

sentences.english: At that time Jesus went through the grainfields on the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 那時，耶穌在安息日，從麥地經過。

definition: soul and spirit of the deceased
to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
